solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int numberOfArithmeticSlices(int[] A) {--newline--        int curr = 0, sum = 0;--newline--        for (int i=2; i<A.length; i++)--newline--            if (A[i]-A[i-1] == A[i-1]-A[i-2]) {--newline--                curr += 1;--newline--                sum += curr;--newline--            } else {--newline--                curr = 0;--newline--            }--newline--        return sum;--newline--    }--newline--}
